There will be lots of third quarter earnings news from tech companies this week, starting today with Yahoo! and Intel -- companies with new leadership and different goals. Carl Howe, of the Yankee Group, says while growth may remain in question, Yahoo! and its new head Marisa Mayer making all the right moves.

description: Checking in on the earnings for two tech stalwarts going through transition.
title: Wall Street score cards for Yahoo! and Intel
teaser: Checking in on the earnings for two tech stalwarts going through transition.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, October 15, 2013
contentencoded: There will be lots of third quarter earnings news from tech companies this week, starting today with Yahoo! and Intel -- companies with new leadership and different goals. Carl Howe, of the Yankee Group, says while growth may remain in question, Yahoo! and its new head Marisa Mayer making all the right moves.
